医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
瑞典研究改变了乳腺癌基因检测的国家指南BRCA1 和 BRCA2 是众所周知的乳腺癌基因，与遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢癌风险显着增加相关。然而，还有另外十一个基因与这些类型的癌症风险升高相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Swedish-study-changes-national-guidelines-for-genic-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Swedish-study-changes-national-guidelines-for-genic-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439f4ac5-4631-47c3-8a9e-2f160c739510 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 20:57:24 -0400 Swedish study changes national guidelines for genetic testing in breast cancer
格里菲斯正处于疫苗开发技术突破的边缘格里菲斯大学的研究人员正处于疫苗开发技术突破的边缘，可能会出现一种新的疫苗模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Griffith-on-the-brink-of-technological-breakthrough-in-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Griffith-on-the-brink-of-technological-breakthrough-in-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d112250-4777-4f69-b005-f9ea8cdc16f7 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 20:46:30 -0400 Griffith on the brink of technological breakthrough in vaccine development
斯托尔斯研究人员揭示了为什么某些抗癌药物会引起意想不到的副作用由于大约 90% 的药物未能进入市场，药物开发行业提高效率的潜力是显而易见的。由于多种原因，旨在对抗癌症的药物也遭受类似的失败率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Stowers-researchers-reveal-why-certain-anti-cancer-drugs-can-cause-unexpected-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Stowers-researchers-reveal-why-certain-anti-cancer-drugs-can-cause-unexpected-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0520a8ee-5bef-46f9-a50f-2b289e89cc52 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 15:39:49 -0400 Stowers researchers reveal why certain anti-cancer drugs can cause unexpected side effects
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款 300 万美元用于研究合生医疗食品对老年女性骨骼健康的影响美国国立卫生研究院/国家老龄化研究所授予 R01 300 万美元拨款，用于研究 Solarea Bio 开发的益生菌/益生元（合生元）医疗食品对维持老年女性骨骼健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/NIH-awards-243-million-grant-to-study-synbiotic-medical-food-for-bone-health-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/NIH-awards-243-million-grant-to-study-synbiotic-medical-food-for-bone-health-in-older-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a85f9885-74bf-4441-85b0-baefa50bef4c Wed, 23 Aug 2023 15:30:29 -0400 NIH awards $3 million grant to study synbiotic medical food for bone health in older women
新研究调查农业火灾烟雾与痴呆症风险之间的联系在世界范围内，通过燃烧农作物残茬来整理农田的做法会向大气中排放大量气态污染物和气溶胶颗粒，并且是一种已知的心肺健康危害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-study-to-investigate-link- Between-agriculture-fire-smoke-and-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-study-to-investigate-link- Between-agriculture-fire-smoke-and-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e519f0f3-ae49-402d-963c-ac5aff7e91cc Wed, 23 Aug 2023 15:15:26 -0400 New study to investigate link between agricultural fire smoke and dementia risk
长读长测序揭示了 3 型 Bartter 综合征的新细节Bartter 综合征 3 型是基因组中多种结构变异的结果。通过使用长读长测序，Janine Altmüller 和她来自 Max Delbrück 中心、BIH 和科隆大学医院的团队以前所未有的详细程度绘制了这种罕见疾病的图谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Long-read-sequencing-reveals-new-details-of-Bartter-syndrome-type-3.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Long-read-sequencing-reveals-new-details-of-Bartter-syndrome-type-3.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acd50deb-a942-4f36-8f20-2d73fbbb385f Wed, 23 Aug 2023 15:09:30 -0400 Long-read sequencing reveals new details of Bartter syndrome type 3
在强烈反对后，联邦政府取消了可能限制乳房重建选择的计划联邦监管机构放弃了一项计划，医生、患者和乳腺癌患者倡导团体担心该计划会限制女性进行重建手术的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/After-backlash-feds-cancel-plan-that-risked-limiting-breast-reconstruction-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/After-backlash-feds-cancel-plan-that-risked-limiting-breast-reconstruction-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=181deec4-8ed3-49df-9189-88e9d33b9edf Wed, 23 Aug 2023 15:00:56 -0400 After backlash, feds cancel plan that risked limiting breast reconstruction options
研究显示，许多美国年轻人存在不良生活方式因素和心脏代谢疾病《美国心脏协会杂志》上发表的研究表明，许多美国年轻人患有不良生活方式因素和心脏代谢疾病，例如肥胖、糖尿病和高血压，且不同种族和民族的发病率有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Many-US-young-adults-have-poor-lifestyle-factors-and-cardiometabolic-diseases-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Many-US-young-adults-have-poor-lifestyle-factors-and-cardiometabolic-diseases-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32dda859-cbb6-43ee-bfb7-2118384e923f Wed, 23 Aug 2023 14:59:21 -0400 Many US young adults have poor lifestyle factors and cardiometabolic diseases, study reveals
导管消融可降低所有房颤患者患痴呆症的风险先前的研究表明，导管消融与房颤患者痴呆和过早死亡的风险降低之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Catheter-ablation-linked-to-lower-risk-of-dementia-in-all-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Catheter-ablation-linked-to-lower-risk-of-dementia-in-all-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d01d9a8-3fad-431b-a233-acef11bb3680 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 14:46:37 -0400 Catheter ablation linked to lower risk of dementia in all patients with atrial fibrillation
年轻人久坐的生活方式可能损害心脏健康根据 2023 年 ESC 大会上发表的研究，童年时期长时间不活动可能会为以后的心脏病发作和中风埋下伏笔。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Sedentary-lifestyle-in-young-people-may-harm-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Sedentary-lifestyle-in-young-people-may-harm-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9df99265-7d4c-4f11-bb86-8c10756a7f9d Wed, 23 Aug 2023 14:32:04 -0400 Sedentary lifestyle in young people may harm heart health
